Content.name: Invoices
Content.text_content:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<ExpressView xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <FolderId>00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</FolderId>
  <GroupByFields>

      <BreakText>INVOICE_2.STATUS</BreakText>
      <IsSortedAscending>true</IsSortedAscending>
      <Width>-1</Width>
      <GroupCellDataFormat>
        <decimalSymbol>.</decimalSymbol>
        <Type>General</Type>
        <DecimalPlaces>0</DecimalPlaces>
        <UseSeparator>true</UseSeparator>
        <SeparatorSymbol>,</SeparatorSymbol>
        <UseCurrency>false</UseCurrency>

      </HeaderFontFormat>
      <DataCellsFontFormat>

    </ExpressViewGroupByField>

  <Columns>

        <SeparatorSymbol>,</SeparatorSymbol>

        <UsePercentSign>false</UsePercentSign>

        <DecimalPlaces>0</DecimalPlaces>
        <UseSeparator>true</UseSeparator>
        <SeparatorSymbol>,</SeparatorSymbol>
        <UseCurrency>false</UseCurrency>
        <CurrencySymbol>$</CurrencySymbol>
        <DecimalSymbol>.</DecimalSymbol>
        <BlankWhenZero>false</BlankWhenZero>
        <UsePercentSign>false</UsePercentSign>
        <UseNegativeSymbol>true</UseNegativeSymbol>
        <UseNegativeParens>false</UseNegativeParens>
        <NegativeColor />

      </FootersDataFormat>
      <HorizontalAlign>Right</HorizontalAlign>
      <HeaderFontFormat>

        <Underline>None</Underline>
      </HeaderFontFormat>

      </DetailChunkFontFormat>

      </GroupFootersDropdownFontFormat>
      <ReportFooterDropdownFontFormat>
        <Weight>Bold</Weight>
        <Underline>None</Underline>
      </ReportFooterDropdownFontFormat>
    </ExpressViewColumn>
  </Columns>
  <AllFilters>
    <ExpressViewFilter>
      <FilterText>CUSTOMER_2.CUSTOMER_ID</FilterText>
      <Operator>et</Operator>
      <Values>
        <string>@customer_id@</string>
      </Values>
      <Title>CUSTOMER.CUSTOMER_ID</Title>
    </ExpressViewFilter>
  </AllFilters>
  <AnyFilters>
    <ExpressViewFilter>
      <FilterText>INVOICE_2.STATUS</FilterText>
      <Operator>net</Operator>
      <Values>
        <string>Closed</string>
      </Values>
      <Title>INVOICE.STATUS</Title>
    </ExpressViewFilter>
  </AnyFilters>
  <TopNFilter>
    <Direction>Top</Direction>
    <N>10</N>
    <AggType>Values</AggType>
    <FilterField />
    <ForEachGroups />
  </TopNFilter>
  <Sorts />
  <Formatting>
    <ThemeName>-1</ThemeName>
    <PreviewColors>

    <Height>0</Height>

    <Appearance>

      <DataColorInfo>

      <Is3D>false</Is3D>
      <Style>

        <TitleFontSize>18</TitleFontSize>

      </Style>
      <SortDataBy>None</SortDataBy>
      <SortDataByDirection>Ascending</SortDataByDirection>

  <ExportSettings>

    <PageOrientation>Portrait</PageOrientation>

  <ShowGroupFooters>true</ShowGroupFooters>
